items.sentence: This business plan of yours seems almost too optimistic. All I can say is I hope it's more than just wishful thinking.
You'll get tired of a beautiful woman after three days, but you'll get used to an ugly one in the same amount of time.
I don't remember everything that we did that day, but I do remember that we were both exhausted by the end of the day.
We don't have to buy it today. Let's think about it some more, and if we decide we want it, we can come back tomorrow.
Your boyfriend is a problematic person, but that's not a good enough reason to give up or break off your relationship.
